data.name: Grief Visual Novel
data.detailed_description:
This game is a small visual novel in which you will have to make the right decisions so that a woman can overcome her grief and continue with her life, she is very fragile, be careful.

Features:
-15-20 minutes long.
-Minimalistic graphics.
-Unique history.
-Make decisions to get one of the several endings.
data.about_the_game:
This game is a small visual novel in which you will have to make the right decisions so that a woman can overcome her grief and continue with her life, she is very fragile, be careful.

Features:
-15-20 minutes long.
-Minimalistic graphics.
-Unique history.
-Make decisions to get one of the several endings.
data.short_description: A short visual novel about the day to day life of a grieving women. Join her story and make the right decisions so she can get out of a cycle that seems to have no end.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 7
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

  • Storage: 100 MB available space
